scripts.postinstall: cd ./app  &&  npm install && cd ../nw-normal && npm install
scripts.watch: ./node_modules/.bin/gulp copy-assets && cd app && watchify -t vueify -p [ vueify/plugins/extract-css -o dist/main.css ] -e src/js/main.js -o dist/main.js -v
scripts.release: cd app && browserify -t vueify -p [ vueify/plugins/extract-css -o dist/main.css ] -e src/js/main.js -o dist/main.js -v && cd ../ && ./node_modules/.bin/gulp release --env=production
